SEARCH
Package Controller

Class StudentListController

java.lang.Object
Controller.StudentListController
public class StudentListController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing a list of students and handling the interaction between the model and the view. It includes functionalities like adding, removing, and editing students and their grades.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka

    private StudentListView

    The view responsible for displaying the list of students and their data, such as their names, IDs, and grades.

  • Field Details

    • studentList

      private StudentList studentList
      A list containing all students in the system. This list is used for managing student data, such as adding, removing, or editing student information.

    • studentListView

      private StudentListView studentListView
      The view responsible for displaying the list of students and their data, such as their names, IDs, and grades.

    • messagePrinter

      private MessagePrinter messagePrinter
      The messagePrinter object responsible for printing error and success messages

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentListController

      public StudentListController(StudentList studentList, StudentListView studentListView)
      Constructs a new StudentListController.
      Parameters:
      studentList - the student list model to be managed
      studentListView - the view to display the list of students

  • Method Details

    • createNewStudent

      public void createNewStudent(int id, String name, String surname)
      Adds a new student to the list.
      Parameters:
      id - the student's ID
      name - the student's first name
      surname - the student's last name

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(int studentId)
      Removes a student from the list by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to be removed

    • editStudentData

      public void editStudentData(int studentId, String newName, String newSurname)
      Edits the data of a specific student identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to be edited
      newName - the new name for the student
      newSurname - the new surname for the student

    • addGradeToStudent

      public void addGradeToStudent(int studentId, String gradeInput, String teacher, String subject)
      Adds a grade to a specific student identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeInput - the grade input string
      teacher - the name of the teacher assigning the grade
      subject - the subject for which the grade is given

    • removeGradeFromStudent

      public void removeGradeFromStudent(int studentId, int gradeIndex)
      Removes a grade from a student identified by ID and grade index.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeIndex - the index of the grade to be removed

    • editGradeForStudent

      public void editGradeForStudent(int studentId, int gradeIndex, double newGradeValue, String newTeacher, String newSubject)
      Edits a specific grade of a student identified by ID and grade index.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeIndex - the index of the grade to be edited
      newGradeValue - the new grade value as a string
      newTeacher - the new teacher for the grade
      newSubject - the new subject for the grade

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates the view with the current list of students and sorts it by id

    • getStudentList

      public StudentList getStudentList()
      Returns the student list model.

      the StudentList object
